abstract: Wal-Mart, which will begin selling the Nook in 2,500 of its stores, also plans to sell the e-reader on its Web site later this month.
snippet: Wal-Mart, which will begin selling the Nook in 2,500 of its stores, also plans to sell the e-reader on its Web site later this month.
lead_paragraph: Starting Sunday, there will be another front in the e-reader retail war.

headline.main: Wal-Mart to Add Nook to Inventory of E-Readers
headline.print_headline: Wal-Mart To Add Nook To Inventory Of E-Readers
